title: Lee Men's Legendary Relaxed Straight Jean
description: RELAXED FIT. This classic jean sits at the natural waist and features a comfortable, relaxed fit through the seat and thigh that ends with a straight leg for a tailored look that keeps you comfortable all day long.
SUSTAINABLY MADE. Constructed from preferred cotton fabric grown with some of the most sustainable practices, these jeans do good for you AND the environment.
FIVE POCKET STYLING. Constructed with iconic Lee details and authentic 5 pocket styling for a touch of classic Lee style.

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY. For over 100 years, Lee has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Lee is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.
SPECIFICATIONS. (5) Pockets. Zipper fly with button closure. Leg Style: Straight Leg. Leg opening: 16.25-inch.
